item.description:
The Republican State Committee will
elect its new chairperson at this meeting
on Tuesday, January 27, 7PM. Please attend
and support the election of Mike Franco as
Chair with your presence.

Of the three candidates only Mike Franco
will steer the state Party in the right direction
in preparation for the next Presidential election.

Mike addressed the South Shore Summit of
Republicans this past Saturday. You can view
the short video here: http://www.youtube.co...

The established forces within the Party do not
support Mike for many of the same reasons they
did not support Ron Paul. He is seen as an
outsider and one who is willing to stand up
for his convictions.

With your help Mike can be elected the new
MassGOP Chair. Please contact your local
Republican State Committee person now to
express your support for Mike and encourage
them to cast their vote for him. Time is short.
Ask them also to contact other State Committee
members on Mike's behalf. You do not
have to be a Republican to help Mike.

If you do not know who your Republican State
Committee member is please drop me an email
or call 857 350-0575.

Please visit this link on the Daily Paul for
Mike's biography, videos and more information
about how to locate your local Republican
State Committee member:
http://www.dailypaul....

Thank you.
Joe Ureneck

Map of location:
http://www.mapquest.c...
item.name: Republican State Committee Chair Election-Help Elect Mike Franco!
